items.sentence: Do you want to know why Tom didn\'t do that?
Don\'t put all your eggs in the same basket.
I\'ve become very interested in ancient art.
I\'ve been asking myself that same question.
I\'ve been driving this car for three years.
How long will it take you to paint my house?
Tom hasn\'t been told about the problem yet.
Tom is not an easy person to get along with.
Tom is now living in Boston with his father.
Tom never spoke to Mary about what happened.
Tom never told me he used to live in Boston.
Tom never told me what I was supposed to do.
Tom now knows the truth about what happened.
Tom and Mary both stood up at the same time.
Tom and Mary danced together all night long.
Tom and Mary decided to get the same tattoo.
All Tom seems to care about is making money.
All of the shirts that Tom gave me are blue.
Tom never would\'ve dated someone like Mary.
Tom can\'t sing very well and neither can I.
